page.title: 04Alsager College
page.content: The college consists of two sites: Crewe and Alsager.The Alsager college covers 70 acres.430 students live on the site.The students come from all over England,but 60% come from within 100 miles of Alsager.It has plenty of sports facilities.There's a variety of clubs for the students to go to every evening.The college is very important to Alsager,because the students provide business to the shops.Most students chose Alsager college because it had the right kind of subjects.They liked the position of the college in Alsager,but some say it is too far from away from a city.The students can use the sports facilities in their spare time.Some students live outside the college.Those who live inside the college say that the living conditions are comfortable.
